reviewText: Biblically sound and animated enough to interest 8 and 9 year olds

The general content of this DVD was good, but I was disappointed at the unpredictable audio. The music often drowns out the dialogue and when there is no music and only dialogue, the volume is too soft. When I turn it up and the music plays again the volume blasts everyone out of the room. If the sound and audio can be corrected, this would be a great DVD.

I have purchased all of these dvd's for my niece and nephew, and they have watched them countless times each already.  These dvd's are really entertaining, I even love watching them.  I highly recommend all of the Animated Kids Bible dvd's, they really keep the kids interested, while educating them as well.
